creator: jack.rief@paxonix.com
text:
The method name used for constructors, <init>, when placed in a log file 
created with an appender using the XMLLayout, creates a non well-formed XML 
entry in the log file.  

Reading the log file causes problems when the entry is encountered.  I found 
this using the Chainsaw application.  http://sourceforge.net/projects/logui

Recommend using &lt and &gt instead of the < and >.

Also get the error with rc1. Following is the stack trace:
